name: popinjay
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone, usually a man, who is too interested in and proud of their own appearance: He regarded his rival as a conceited popinjay.
More examplesFewer examplesThey preened themselves like popinjays. He was their leader, a soldier, but dressed like a popinjay in multi-coloured hose and high-heeled Spanish riding boots. Among the preening, pompous popinjays of the House of Commons he stands out.The man was a bejewelled, perfumed popinjay.
